name: "Cheers" - The Eighth Season Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 8 | 25 Questions

questions.text: Who played Robin Colcord?
questions.explanation:
Roger Rees.

	Tony Di Benedetto played Tony. Peter Schreiner played Pete. Bill Steinkellner was one of the writers for this episode.

questions.text: Who wrote the episode entitled "A Bar is Born"?
questions.explanation:
Phoef Sutton.

	Besides writing, Phoef Sutton was also a producer on "Cheers" from 1990-1992.

questions.text: Maggie, Cliff's girlfriend, returns from another country in "How to Marry a Mailman". What country was she in?
questions.explanation:
Canada.

	Maggie was played by Annie Golden.

questions.text: What is the name of the alter ego that Norm creates in "The Two Faces of Norm"?
questions.explanation:
Anton Kreitzer.

	Kreitzer was Vera's maiden name. Norm was played by George Wendt.

questions.text: Where does Lilith give birth to Frederick.
questions.explanation:
a cab.

	Lilith: "The cab driver was nice enough to let me bite down on his foam dice."

questions.text: What is the name of Eddie Lebec's other wife?
questions.explanation:
Gloria.

	Gloria was played by Anne DeSalvio.

questions.text: Where is Frederick's bris held?
questions.explanation:
Cheers.

	A bris is the Jewish ceremony where a male child is circumcised.

questions.text: Who won the beard growing contest?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	We find out at the end that Cliff's beard isn't real, but the other memebers don't know it because when Carla suspects it, and pulls the beard it doesn't come off.

questions.text: What board game does Norm, Cliff, Frasier, and Woody play in " The Art of the Steal"?
questions.explanation:
Monopoly.

	They object of the game was to teach Woody about the principles of economics.

questions.text: How does Frasier describe Doris?
questions.explanation:
the Morton Salt girl.

	Doris was played by Cynthia Stevenson. Stevenson played Hope in "Hope and Gloria".

questions.text: What is the name of Robin's boat that Sam sails?
questions.explanation:
The Rebecca.

	Sam: "You named your boat after Rebecca?"                        Robin: "No, I christened this ship long before I met Rebecca, I named it after the Bibical Rebecca."                             Rebecca: "But I had an aunt who was named after the Bibical Rebecca and I am named after her. And that isn't the end of it. She was as big as a boat and as old as the Bible."

questions.text: Who does Rebecca believe could be a three term president?
questions.explanation:
Jimmy Carter.

	Rebecca finished her report "Jimmy Carter: The Three Term President" about ten years after it was due. Her teacher marked her down a grade for being tardy. She gave Sam an A for his, well...class participation.

questions.text: What does Cliff put for the Final Jeopardy question in "What is Cliff Clavin"?
questions.correct: Who are three people who've never been in my kitchen?
options: Who are three really good actors?
Who are three people who have dated each other?
Who are three people who never married?
questions.explanation:
Who are three people who've never been in my kitchen?.

	Alex Trebek played himself in this episode.

questions.text: Rebecca says that Robin said "I love you". In the pool, Cliff was the closest. What did he have that Robin would say?
questions.correct: I'll respect you in the morning.
questions.explanation:
I'll respect you in the morning.

	When Rebecca said "He said it, those three little words". Sam's reply was "Walk the plank."

questions.text: Does Rebecca take the bracelet that Robin offers her in "Finally - Part II"?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Sam: "You're gonna regret it for the rest of your life."              Rebecca: "You're right. Robin, I will take that bracelet."

questions.text: Which member of Kelly's family hits on Woody?
questions.explanation:
mother.

	Kelly's mother was played by Melendy Britt.

questions.text: Complete this line spoken by Viper in "Severe Crane Damage". Frasier: "I have a confession, that wasn't the wind; that was me." Viper: "I should have guessed. It's the first time I heard the wind recite ______________."
questions.explanation:
The Lord's Prayer.

	Viper was played by Lorelle Brina.

questions.text: When Sam plays Robin in Chess and wins, how much money does he win?
questions.explanation:
one penny.

	Robin says he pays himself one dollar a year, which comes to about 1 penny a week after taxes. He said he does this to keep his tax bracket for the year down.

questions.text: When Woody does "Hair," does he get naked?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Woody is the only one in the cast that took of his clothes.

questions.text: Of the following guys, which one didn't shave his head in "Bar Wars III- Return of Tecumseh"?
questions.explanation:
Sam Malone.

	Sam bought a skull cap not wanting to mess up his real hair.

questions.text: What is Kelly's middle name?
questions.explanation:
Susan.

	Woody's middle name is Tyberius. Which also happens to be Captain Kirk's middle name in "Star Trek".

questions.text: What vegetable does Carla say she saw Eddie's face in?
questions.explanation:
broccoli.

	Norm: "Let's be fair: Eddie's face looked like broccoli."

questions.text: In "Mr. Otis Regrets" where does Sam take Rebecca to show her how he spent the night with the French woman that Robin is also dating?
questions.explanation:
elevator.

	The title came from the man who invented the elevator: Elisha Otis.

questions.text: Complete this line spoken by Norm in "Cry Hard". "Rebecca, maybe you are too _____________ to live."
questions.explanation:
stupid.

	Rebecca just found out that Robin has been doing insider trading since the day after her and Robin first slept together. She concludes that she's "too stupid to live". Sam says "Maybe that's the last bad thing he'll ever do." Rebecca says "Gee Sam, do you think so?" This propts Norm to agree with Rebecca's statement about being too stupid to live.

questions.text: Sam gets the bar back in "Cry Harder" how much does he pay for it?
options: nothing, he gets it for free
questions.explanation:
85 cents.

	The gang all chants: "Sammy got the bar back...Sammy got the bar back." Then when Rebecca found out he got it by turning Robin in she says: "You are a dead man, mister." The gang all chants: "Sammy is a dead man."
